Text:
Why is THE 2010 VERSION over 900mb less than the 2010 version, which you can see by: hawkinsj

http://thepiratebay.org/torrent/4285403/Smart_Draw-----FROM---BRAVO-6---------------

After trying both i have gone with the 26mb 2010 version.

OK. In this 2010 version all the files need to downloaded for template options, etc.

Would not patch for me.

Would downloading the extra content work anyway?
Ok, so NIS 2012 found 2 trojans and cleaned them without affecting the software. After this the keygen works great and SmartDraw downloads its templates w/o problems. Cheers
